physical_appearance:This is a photograph of a collection of stuffed animals taken in Kandy
 Sri Lanka. There are various animals presented on raised platforms. Various birds are perched on a tree branch. There are two leopards
 one on either side of the tree
 placed on platforms. At the bottom of the platform
 there are several other small animals
 such as deers and geese
 on the ground. Sparse vegetation is added amongst the animals. The title is written at the bottom
 below the photograph.

metadata.physical_appearance: This is a photograph of a collection of stuffed animals taken in Kandy, Sri Lanka. There are various animals presented on raised platforms. Various birds are perched on a tree branch. There are two leopards, one on either side of the tree, placed on platforms. At the bottom of the platform, there are several other small animals, such as deers and geese, on the ground. Sparse vegetation is added amongst the animals. The title is written at the bottom, below the photograph.
metadata.subject_terms_2: Photographs Thomson, J. (John), 1837-1921 Kandy (Sri Lanka) Taxidermy Hobbies
